Text: An uncharted island...?

Yes. We have no idea of its distance or relative
position from the resort.

We were tossed into the ocean, and then you got swept
away, so there wasn't any time to think of that.
...Oh, so that's how it went down.

Anyway, for now let's have a look around the island.
We just might learn a few things.

Good idea. How about we split up and do a
preliminary check of the island?

In that case, I'll set off in the opposite direction
of Zeta. Then once she and I meet, we'll return here.
Gotcha. Be careful, you two.

...Heheheh! The raft capsized! And then I was thrown
into the ocean, shipwrecked! And now I've washed
ashore on a strange island! It's perfect!

This plot turn, this location, can only mean
one thing! Fun is coming my way!

...Nothing. No traces of inhabitants, much less
settlements.

Same. I didn't find anywhere that looked like it'd
seen the touch of human hands.

As much I'd been avoiding the thought...it looks like
this island is uninhabited.
Yes, I do believe that's the only conclusion.
I see...

(Oh hell yeah! Just as I predicted! A deserted
island!)

(Just as I was getting sick of my oh-so-perfect
vacation, I'm thrust into desert island survival
mode!)

(Survival... Ahh, just the sound of the word is music
to my ears! That jaunt on the raft was definitely
worth it!)

This is quite the fix we're in here, especially when
you consider we lack almost any sort of information
needed to return to the resort...

And it's plain to see that going back out on the
water heedlessly would only make the situation worse.

Which means...the wise course of action would
probably be to sit tight here for the time being
until help arrives.

The staff at the resort will most likely have noticed
we're missing by now.

But in the meantime we'll have to fend for ourselves.
Think you can manage that, Cid?
Sure, no problems here.

(Yes, here it is! Exactly what I'd been hoping for!
There are be no amenities to be found here!)

(Just self-sufficiency, each of day of life a hard-
fought victory! Kiss that cushy vacation goodbye!)

(And if this starts to get boring... Well, I'm sure
we'll reach land at some point if we start swimming.)

(But the main point is, living off the land is part
of every boy's dream! And I'm gonna make the most of
it!)

(I feel kinda bad for Alpha and Zeta...but I'll bring
them along for the ride. Think of it as training.)
To think this is what our vacation has turned into...
Seriously. An absolute disaster.

(It's just the three of us here on this island. So
living here by our own means...)

(...is pretty much the same thing as living with
Master Shadow...!)

Since we're going to be here for a while, our first
move should be getting the essentials covered.

Each and every day must be lived with care. And then,
eventually, the three of us will escape this rock!
Of course. Still—
It wouldn't hurt to take it easy for bit, would it?
...Huh?
